name: PAT_MEM_ID
description: This table is used to link patients to a member ID associated with one of the patients coverages.

columns.name: PATIENT_ID
columns.description: This is the Epic Patient ID.

columns.name: MEMBER_ID
columns.description: This is the patient's Member ID associated with a carrier.  You can use this number to look up the patient and his/her family members.

columns.name: LONG_MEMBER_ID
columns.description: This is the patient's Member ID preceded by a chart or Medical Record Number. This column contains the data that is stored in the Member ID super item (EPT 5001).

columns.name: MEM_ID_CARRIER_ID
columns.description: Member ID maintained by a carrier

columns.name: MEM_ID_CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.
